original_text: You must listen to the messages that my servants the prophets tell you. I have sent them to speak to you many times, but you have not listened to them.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 나의 종 선지자들을 꾸준히 보내 그들의 말을 순종하라고 하였으나 너희는 순종하지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: You must listen to the messages
that my servants the prophets tell you
I have sent them to speak to you
but you have not listened to them
